channel.title: Npc dialogue change
channel.description:
here is a picture of an npc talking:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/talking.jpg[/img]
i want to know how to change what he says (the text) can some1 tell me how? i've tried texthandler but it's not in there i need help!

item.title: Npc dialogue change
item.dc:creator: @Atk2-99 Atk2-99
item.description:
@Atk2-99 wrote:

[quote=“CookieScape, post:5, topic:350004”][quote author=Atk2-99 link=topic=446374.msg3275922#msg3275922 date=1279531051]
Open your NPCHandler and search for what hes saying, Replace it with what you want him to say, Save&Compile
[/quote]

No. It isn’t in npcHandler.

Could also be in NPCDialogue if it exists.

Oh yeah, your right, it isnt NPCHandler, if its not NPCDialogue then it might be in Client.java

Yes, if they have one.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Npc dialogue change

item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

Atk2-99:

Open your NPCHandler and search for what hes saying, Replace it with what you want him to say, Save&Compile

pure2ownage:

Could also be in NPCDialogue if it exists.

Yes, if they have one.

item.title: Npc dialogue change
item.dc:creator: @CookieScape CookieScape
item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

Search for the text in client class. It will be under the NPC ID. Example:

if(NPCID == xxx) { sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(xxx), 4884); sendFrame126("Text here", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue...", 4886); sendFrame75(xxx, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; }

That is just ripped from my source. Don’t use it. Just an example.

Read full topic
